EmailTemplate.name: Iowa Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: vAuto Pricing and Appraisal Workshop - Des Moines, IA - April 14
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Pricing and Appraisal Workshop Des Moines, IA Tuesday, April 14, 2015
You are cordially invited to join us on Tuesday, April 14, 2015 when Tom Murphy, Director of Performance Management, will conduct a Pricing and Appraisal Workshop.
This workshop is complimentary to all vAuto customers and is recommended for General Managers, Sales Managers, and Buyers.
Workshop Overview: - Ensure that every car in your inventory is priced in the perfect position to achieve maximum exposure to buyers - Know precisely how much more you can ask for a vehicle while maintaining your rank at the head of the pack and maximize your profit potential - Analyze Market Days Supply and know how hot or not a car is in your market - Develop a fast and profitable exit strategy before buying a vehicle - Know exactly what getting out of a vehicle means in terms of your dealership’s profit goals – before you get in.
Location: Courtyard Des Moines Ankeny 2405 SE Creekview Drive Ankeny, IA 50021 (515) 422-5555
Agenda Overview: 8:30am - Check-in and Continental Breakfast (provided by vAuto) 9:00am - Meeting Start 12:00pm - Meeting End
Registration: Please use this link to register <http://go.vauto.com/Iowa-Workshop-April-14.html> your attendees by April 7th. You will have to fill out the form for each person you would like to register. Once you submit the form, you will receive a confirmation email.
Note: To reserve a hotel room at the Courtyard Des Moines Ankeny, you may book online here <http://www.marriott.com/hotels/travel/dsman-courtyard-des-moines-ankeny/> or call the hotel directly at (515) 422-5555.
I hope you can join Tom on April 14th.
John
John Griffin, Jr. Vice President, Performance Management, Software Division Cox Automotive 1901 S. Meyers Rd. Suite 700 Oakbrook Terrace, IL 60181 www.vauto.com <http://www.vauto.com/home/> Location: Courtyard Des Moines Ankeny 2405 SE Creekview Drive Ankeny, IA 50021 (515) 422-5555
Agenda Overview: 8:30am - Check-in and Continental Breakfast (provided by vAuto) 9:00am - Meeting Start 12:00pm - Meeting End <http://go.vauto.com/Iowa-Workshop-April-14.html>
